Scripts.OnLoad: GameTooltip_OnLoad(self) self.shoppingTooltips = {ShoppingTooltip1, ShoppingTooltip2} if (BattlePetTooltip) then BattlePetTooltip:Hide() end
Scripts.OnHide: GameTooltip_OnHide(self) ShoppingTooltip1:Hide() ShoppingTooltip2:Hide() if (BattlePetTooltip) then BattlePetTooltip:Hide() end

Scripts.OnEnter: PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a Language for the addon to use.")
PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Enables or disables the addon completely.")
if Lib_UIDropDownMenu_IsEnabled(self) then PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a Sound Pack to use for kill sounds.") end
if Lib_UIDropDownMenu_IsEnabled(self) then PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a Language/Type from the Sound Pack to use for kill sounds.") end
if Lib_UIDropDownMenu_IsEnabled(self) then PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a Sound Channel to use.") end
if Lib_UIDropDownMenu_IsEnabled(self) then PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a mode to use.") end
if Lib_UIDropDownMenu_IsEnabled(self) then PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a Sound Pack to use for battleground sounds.") end
if Lib_UIDropDownMenu_IsEnabled(self) then PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a Language/Type from the Sound Pack to use for battleground sounds.") end
PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Enables or disables Multi Kill Sounds.")
